# File test/lib/view_test_process.rb, line 80
    def validate_page_numbers expected, links, param_name = :page
      param_pattern = /\W#{CGI.escape(param_name.to_s)}=([^&]*)/
      
      assert_equal(expected, links.map { |e|
        e['href'] =~ param_pattern
        $1 ? $1.to_i : $1
      })
    end
